articles.author: Theresa Waldrop, CNN
articles.title: Californians line up to legally buy recreational pot
articles.description: California began selling recreational marijuana today in what's seen as a milestone in the mainstreaming of the weed, and hundreds lined up to buy it.

articles.author: Madison Park, CNN
articles.title: Who gets the dog in a divorce and other state laws going into effect in 2018
articles.description: Hundreds of new state laws go into effect. Here's a look at some of them that kick in with the New Year.

articles.title: California legalizes recreational marijuana - CNN Video
articles.description: California is the latest state to legalize recreational marijuana use. CNN's Miguel Marquez reports from inside a California dispensary as it prepares for its first day of sales.

articles.title: How politics could change in 2018 - CNN Video
articles.description: More than 450 seats in the US Congress will be up for grabs in 2018. CNN's Chris Cillizza explains how the political landscape could change after midterm elections.

articles.title: Crystal Ball: What will happen next year?
articles.description: CNN contributors and commentators make predictions for some of 2018â€™s big events.

articles.author: Julia Horowitz
articles.title: List of 2018 minimum wage increases by US state and city
articles.description: The minimum wage is going up in 18 states and 20 cities and counties on Jan. 1, 2018.

articles.author: Alanne Orjoux, CNN
articles.title: Kim Jong Un says the nuclear button is always on his desk
articles.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, during his national New Year's address, warned the United States that the nuclear button is always on his desk.

articles.author: Matt Rehbein, Sarah Aarthun and Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Colorado gunman who killed deputy was an Iraq veteran, official says
articles.description: The man who launched a deadly attack on four police officers inside a Colorado apartment was a former Army Reservist who was deployed in Iraq for a year, a spokesperson for the military said Monday.

articles.author: Sandra Gonzalez, CNN
articles.title: 1,000 women in entertainment announce plan to combat harassment
articles.description: A group of more than 1,000 women in entertainment have detailed a comprehensive plan to combat sexual harassment in all industries.

articles.author: Madison Park, CNN
articles.title: Chicago police count fewer murders in 2017, but 650 people were killed
articles.description: Chicago saw nearly a 16% decline in murders in 2017 from the previous year, according to statistics released in the early hours of New Year's Day.
